title: Page break missing when previewing attached PDF file
description: When previewing an attached PDF file, the page break in the first item doesn't occur as expected.
OB: When opening the attached PDF file for preview, the first item does not have a page break, and the content flows continuously from one page to the next.
EB: I expected that when I open the attached PDF file for preview, there should be a page break at the end of the first item, ensuring proper separation between the pages.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the attached PDF file mentioned in bug report 1228982 for preview.
